global.general.quest_limit: The max quest limit of player can take in same time
global.general.portal_render_type: The render type of portal [1 is particle effect] [0 is just a picture]
global.general.enable_item_element_toolt: Show element infomation when the mouse moves over the item [only creative mode]
global.general.max_life_time_of_parcel: Max hour of Parcel be hold in post office, it will be remove if overdue [-1 is never overdue]
global.general.building_max_remain_times: The max second limit of inactive temporary buildings in memory, it will be wrote to file and remove from memory if overdue, and read from file when used [0 is never remove from memory]
item.elementalsorcery_magic_blast_wand.m: Basic damage of magic blast, need [n] magic for 1 damage
Max limit of damage before attenuation, over part will be attenuated with log10
Range decay rate of damage, big number, more attenuation
Count of Absorb or Release elements per tick of The Wizard Book of Elements
block.elementalsorcery_life_flower.proba: The chance to consume the magic in the Magic Pot pre growing
block.elementalsorcery_seal_stone.mantra: The probability of One Point Fortune dropping the Ancient Paper with Mantra when destroy a Seal Stone
block.elementalsorcery_elf_fruit.elf_fru: The probability of trying to generate Elf Fruit under the Elf Leaf
The probability of Elf Fruit trying to fall
tile.general.tile_entity_render_distance: The maximum rendering distance of TileEntity, beyond which no rendering is allowed. [0 is program default][-1 is following rendering chunk distance]
tile.general.md_base_max_capacity: The default max magic limit of Magic Drives
tile.general.md_base_overflow: The default lower magic limit of Magic Drives can send magic to another
tile.general.md_base_send_pre_second: Send magic per second of Magic Drives
tile.elementalsorcery_mdmagicgen.max_cap: The max magic limit of Magic Separator
tile.elementalsorcery_mdmagiclization.ma: The max magic limit of Element Magiclization Box
tile.elementalsorcery_mdfusion.gen_max_m: Magic Drive Enchanting Box gen Max Magic per seconds on night
tile.elementalsorcery_mdfusion.max_capac: The max magic limit of Element Magic Drive Enchanting Box
tile.elementalsorcery_mdliquidizer.juice: The max limit of juice capacity that the Liquidizer can store
tile.elementalsorcery_devolvecube.max_au: The max limit of Auto Element Transfers that one Devolve Cube can manage
The max limit per sec for Devolve Cube auto transfer Element
tile.elementalsorcery_elementreactor.onc: Ratio of elements extracted each time
When mantra charging, ratio of elements taken out each time
Ratio of elements inserted each time
tile.elementalsorcery_elementreactor.max: When iF / Capacity Of iF > This Value, power are not grow
tile.elementalsorcery_elementreactor.ift: iF transmission rate coefficient's exponential  (Power Line / 10.0 + 1) ^ This Value
tile.elementalsorcery_elementreactor.wor: magic fragment's coefficient in working, This Value * Power Line
spawn_and_gen.world_gen_and_spawn_config: The worlds can spawn [Invalid for Entity]
Generated density for Worlds Array, 0 is default, big number bring more possibilities of generation
Generated density for Biomes Array, 0 is default, big number bring more possibilities of generation
